page.title: 02Ballet In Hythe.
page.content:
In Hythe there is a ballet school. It is not as well known as the Royal Ballet. It is held on a Friday at the Cannon Newman Hall. The Cannon Newman Hall is not just for ballet, it is used for Sunday School and things like that. This ballet club is run by Mrs Kennedy and has a helper called Mrs Barnes. They also have a piano player but I cannot remember her name.
You wear a pink dress that is very short and you wear a wrap around cardigan that crosses in the middle. You have about three quarters of an hour for about 60p or something like that. It is good for people that like ballet.
